Population: people with bisphosphonate‐related osteonecrosis of the jaw (BRONJ)
Intervention: hyperbaric oxygen therapy in addition to surgery, antibiotics and oral rinse
Outcome: Healing of osteonecrosis (dichotomous outcome ('healed' vs. 'improved', 'unchanged' and 'worse') measured at 3 months)
Reasons for GRADE if not High: Quality of the evidence was downgraded by one level for imprecision and two levels for high risk of bias.
